TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k oʊ l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k ɚ t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ d ɪ s t ɪ ŋ k s w ɪ t ɚ f ʌ m ð ə s t ɔː r s ɪ k s p uː t ʌ v ʌ v f ɾ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v t ɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n a k f ɜː r ə b ɑː t ɚ b ɔ p w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː t ə s m ɔː p l æ s t ð ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ə b ɪ k t aʊ f ɾ ɔ k f ɔː r ð ə k ɪ s ʃ ɪ k æ n s k uː p d ɪ s t ɪ ŋ k s ɪ n t ʊ t ɹ iː r ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ r w a l s d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɾ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n

SNAKE NOCONTEXT: sneɪk

BAGS INCONTEXT: bæɡz
